statistics.Ready For Use: Represents the instrument count that is available for sampling
statistics.In-Use: Represents the number of instruments that are currently being used by the Operator(s)
statistics.Disconnected: Represents the number of instruments that are not available for sampling
statistics.Most Recent Sample: Indicates the most recent data or measurement that was recorded or collected before the current time
statistics.Samples This Week: Gives the sample count executed over the duration of the week
statistics.Samples This Month: Gives the sample count of samples performed over the month
statistics.All Samples Taken: Sample count of all samples taken to date

resources.head: Resource panel provides support and guidance related to the Digital Air Series

data.name: Support Portal
data.value: The support portal is a platform where users get assistance and find solutions to questions and/or issues. The support portal offers communication via a ticketing system to ensure prompt and efficient support

data.name: Documentation
data.value: The documentation link provides additional content about the Digital Air Series such as feature/functionality documentation, user guides, and technical resources

data.name: Tutorials
data.value: Tutorials are available to guide users through specific tasks or processes, offering step-by-step instructions or demonstrations

data.name: Release Notes
data.value: The Release Notes identify the features/functionality changes for each version of Digital Air Series

Status.head: The Status column displays the instrument status

data.name: Ready for Use
data.value: The instrument is onboarded and available to take a measurement

data.name: Disconnected
data.value: The instrument is currently not connected or accessible

data.name: Not Ready for Use
data.value: The instrument is currently accessible. This may be due to the device site not being assigned or the device time being out of sync.

data.name: In-Use
data.value: The instrument is currently in use.

data.name: Inactivated
data.value: The administrator can Inactivate an instrument in the Action column. Inactivating an instrument prevents unintended usage or access when the device is in a connected state.

data.name: In Use
data.value: The instrument has been used by the user

instrument.Instrument Name: The instrument name given during the onboarding process
instrument.Site Name: The Site where the instrument will be taking samples/measurements
instrument.Serial #: The serial number associated with the instrument

Admin Status.head: The instrument status that indicates if an instrument is available for sampling or not

data.name: Onboarded
data.value: The instrument is onboarded on the Digital Air Series Platform

instrument.Edit: This action will edit the instrument details
instrument.Last Heartbeat: Indicates the last time an instrument sent a signal or updated its status

Action.head: Active & Inactive Action Types That Are Supported:

data.name: Active
data.value: To activate the instrument.

data.name: Inactive
data.value: To make the instrument inactive.

measure.Check: To begin the sampling select the Check Box of the instrument that is in Ready for Use status
measure.Instrument Name: The instrument name given during the onboarding process

Status.head: The Status column displays the instrument status

data.name: Ready for Use
data.value: The instrument is onboarded and available to take a measurement

data.name: Disconnected
data.value: The instrument is currently not connected or accessible

data.name: In Use
data.value: The instrument has been used by the user

Data.head: The Data column displays the icons

data.name: Page Icon
data.value: The page icon represents the information of the recent taken sample on the instrument

data.name: Sample Icon
data.value: The arrow pointing in the box icon represents an in-progress sample on an instrument

data.name: Flush Icon
data.value: The brush cleaning icon represents an in-progress flush on an instrument

measure.Serial #: The serial number associated with the instrument
measure.Last Heartbeat: Indicates the last time an instrument sent a signal or updated its status

Exception.head: Abort & Force Drop exception types that are supported

data.name: Abort
data.value: To stop the sample/Flush

data.name: Force Drop
data.value: To stop the sample/Flush in case the instrument gets disconnected or powered off

Sample Status.head: The Status column indicates the current sample state

data.name: In-Progress
data.value: A measurement has started and set the status on the instrument

data.name: Synced
data.value: Synced Sample Status should be included.

data.name: Completed
data.value: The sample status shown when the sample finishes without any interruptions and the operator reviews the result and confirms the sample with E-Signature

data.name: Reviewed
data.value: The sample status shown when the operator reviews the result after the sample is completed

data.name: Aborted
data.value: The sample status shown when an operator terminates running a sample

data.name: Force Drop
data.value: The sample status shown when the operator is running the sample and the instrument disconnects

data.name: In-Progress Disconnected
data.value: The sample status shown, when the operator is running the sample, the instrument disconnects and does not Force Drop the sample

data.name: External Sample
data.value: The sample status shown when the sample is collected after the instrument is reconnected to the Digital Air Series Platform

data.name: External Interrupt
data.value: The sample status shown when the instrument is powered off or the ethernet cable has disconnected while the operator is running the sample

data.name: Suspended
data.value: The sample status shown when the operator is running the sample and the instrument disconnects

data.Instrument Name: The Instrument Name column displays the instrument name and allows users to search for instruments by their assigned names or identifiers

Sample Type.head: The Sample Type column indicates the type of sample that is being executed

data.name: Sample - Single
data.value: The operator started a Sample - Single on the instrument

data.name: Flush - Single
data.value: The operator started flushing the collected particles of the Sample - Single run on the instrument

data.name: Sample - Continuous Run
data.value: The operator started a multiple samples on the instrument

data.name: Flush - Continuous Run
data.value: The operator started flushing the collected particles for the multiple, collected samples

data.Sample ID: This column displays the ID of the samples
data.Continuous Run ID: This column displays the ID of the Continuous Run
data.Measure Start Time: The measure start time field provides the time when the operator started the sample on the instrument
data.Measure End Time: The date/time when the sample collection was completed

Source.head: The Source column indicates the source of sample that is being executed

data.name: IN-HOUSE
data.value: samples that are produced through application

data.name: LIMS
data.value: samples that are produced through LIMS

Exception.head: Abort & Force Drop exception types that are supported

data.name: Abort
data.value: To stop the sample/Flush

data.name: Force Drop
data.value: To stop the sample/Flush in case the instrument gets disconnected or powered off

Event.head: Event is the record created when an action is performed in the DAS platform

data.name: Logged In
data.value: When the user logged IN into the application

data.name: Logged Out
data.value: When the user logged OUT of the application

data.name: Instrument Disconnected
data.value: When instrument connectivity is lost

data.name: Instrument Connected
data.value: When instrument connectivity is reestablished after a disconnect event

data.name: Instrument Onboarded
data.value: When an instrument is onboarded from the UI

data.name: Instrument Inactivated
data.value: When an instrument is Inactivated from the UI

data.name: Instrument Details Updated
data.value: When an instrument details are updated

data.name: Sample-Single Started
data.value: When a sample action command is dispatched to the instrument

data.name: Sample-Single Finished
data.value: When sampling is finished by the instrument and the data collected is stored in the database (DB)

data.name: Sample Aborted
data.value: When sampling is aborted by the instrument and the data collected is stored in the DB

data.name: Abort Initiated
data.value: While running the sample if user initiates the abort button

data.name: Abort Request Failed
data.value: when the abort request failed

data.name: Sample-Continuous Run Started
data.value: When continuous run sample action command is dispatched to the instrument

data.name: Sample-Continuous Run Finished
data.value: When continuous run sampling is finished by the instrument and the data collected is stored in the DB

data.name: Flush-Single Started
data.value: When flush action command is dispatched to the instrument

data.name: Flush-Single Finished
data.value: When flush is finished by the instrument and the data collected is stored in the DB

data.name: Flush-Continuous Run Started
data.value: When continuous run flush action command is dispatched to the instrument

data.name: Flush-Continuous Run Finished
data.value: When continuous run flush is finished by the instrument and the data

data.name: Test Result Viewed
data.value: When the data page of finished sample is viewed, then the audit event is created

data.name: Flush Aborted
data.value: When a flush sample is aborted by the instrument and the data collected is stored in the DB

data.name: Forcedrop Executed
data.value: When Force drop action command is dispatched to drop the data collection of the previous action
data.type: Sample - Single, Sample - Continuous Run, Flush - Single, Flush - Continuous Run

data.name: Forcedrop Initiated
data.value: While running the sample if there is a network or power disruption then user initiates the forcedrop button
data.type: Sample - Single, Sample - Continuous Run, Flush - Single, Flush - Continuous Run

data.name: Forcedrop Request Failed
data.value: When the forcedrop request failed
data.type: Sample - Single, Sample - Continuous Run, Flush - Single, Flush - Continuous Run

data.name: external_interrupt
data.value: When a disconnect happens during an action and the action is not completed by the instrument
data.type: Sample - Single, Sample - Continuous Run, Flush - Single, Flush - Continuous Run

data.name: external_sample
data.value: When external samples are detected after the instrument reconnects and the data for those external samples are processed and stored in the DB

data.name: E-Sign Verification Done
data.value: When the User has been successfully verified

data.name: E-Sign Verification Failed
data.value: When the User verification failed

audit.Instrument Name: The instrument name on which the audit event action was executed
audit.User: The user that executed the audit event
audit.Sample ID: Sample ID specifies the unique ID created for each sample
audit.Continuous Run ID: Unique sample IDs associated with continuous run samples
audit.Timestamp: Timestamp shows the date/time when the audit event was performed
audit.Event Details: EventDetails shows the Comments/details when the audit event was performed

Source.head: The Source column indicates the source of sample that is being executed

data.name: IN-HOUSE
data.value: samples that are produced through application

data.name: LIMS
data.value: samples that are produced through LIMS

Sample Status.head: The Status column indicates the current sample state

data.name: New
data.value: When the sample added from lims

data.name: In-Progress
data.value: A measurement has started and set the status on the instrument

data.name: Completed
data.value: The sample status shown when the sample finishes without any interruptions and the operator reviews the result and confirms the sample with E-Signature

data.name: Reviewed
data.value: The sample status shown when the operator reviews the result after the sample is completed

data.name: Abort
data.value: The sample status shown when an operator terminates running a sample

data.name: Force Drop
data.value: The sample status shown when the operator is running the sample and the instrument disconnects

data.name: In-Progress Disconnected
data.value: The sample status shown, when the operator is running the sample, the instrument disconnects and does not Force Drop the sample

data.name: External Sample
data.value: The sample status shown when the sample is collected after the instrument is reconnected to the Digital Air Series Platform

data.name: External Interrupt
data.value: The sample status shown when the instrument is powered off or the ethernet cable has disconnected while the operator is running the sample

Sample Type.head: The Sample Type column indicates the type of sample that is being executed

data.name: Sample - Single
data.value: The operator started a Sample - Single on the instrument

data.name: Flush - Single
data.value: The operator started flushing the collected particles of the Sample - Single run on the instrument

data.name: Sample - Continuous Run
data.value: The operator started a multiple samples on the instrument

data.name: Flush - Continuous Run
data.value: The operator started flushing the collected particles for the multiple, collected samples

data.name: Abort
data.value: The operator terminated the current ongoing sample on the instrument

data.name: Force Drop
data.value: While the sampling is in progress, and the instrument got disconnected, then the operator will force drops the sample. The sample action is Force Drop

data.name: External sample
data.value: The sample collected after the instrument is reconnected to the Digital Air Series Platform then the sample status shows as External sample

Lims Status.head: The current state result sample data of LIMS sample

data.name: Synced
data.value: The sample data is updated to the LIMS system

data.name: To-sync
data.value: The sample data is not available or updated to LIMS system

lims.Instrument Name: The Instrument Name column displays the instrument name and allows users to search for instruments by their assigned names or identifiers
lims.LIMS ID: This column displays the ID of the Lims
lims.LIMS: The Lims column indicates the source of sample that is being executed
lims.Created By: The user that created the Lims sample

Action.head: Start & to-sync types that are supported in this column

data.name: start
data.value: To select the instrument and start sample

data.name: to-sync
data.value: To export the sample data

users.User Name: The User Name is assigned to the user by the Administrator
users.Org Name: The name of the organization where the user is working
users.Email ID: The email id of the user will be displayed
users.Site Name: The site allocated to the user by admin will be displayed
users.Role: The role allocated to the user by admin will be displayed
users.Status: The admin can activate or deactivate the user
users.Edit: The admin can make changes to the user role

sites.Alias: The alternative names of the site will be displayed
sites.Description: The site details can be added in this section
sites.Timezone: The site timezone will be displayed
sites.Status: The admin can activate or deactivate the site
sites.Edit: The admin can make changes to the site
